file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-46-00-04 - FORWARD ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT ACCESS DOOR - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FORWARD ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT ACCESS DOOR - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the forward-electronic-compartment access door. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FORWARD-ELECTRONIC-COMPART- ALL 52-46-00-000-801-A MENT ACCESS DOOR - REMOVAL FORWARD-ELECTRONIC-COMPART- ALL 52-46-00-400-801-A MENT DOOR - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-46-00 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-46-00-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FORWARD-ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT ACCESS DOOR - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the forward-electronic-compartment access door. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113CZ Forward fuselage 114 113CZ Forward fuselage C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Ladder Commercially available To get access to the work area 1 Fluorescent light Commercially available To illuminate the work area 1 E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward fuselage H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the aircraft is safe for maintenance. (2) Put the ladder in position in the work area. (3) Pull the lock pin and open the forward-electronic-compartment access door (5). I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the bolts (1), washers (2), and spacers (3) that attach the LH tracks (4) to the structure. (2) Release the forward-electronic-compartment access door (5) from the RH tracks. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-46-00 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Turn the forward-electronic-compartment door (5) 90 degrees to remove it from the NLG bay. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-46-00 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Forward-Electronic-Compartment Access Door - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONES 113 114 B NLG BAY (REF.) DET. A 1. BOLT 2. WASHER 3. SPACER 2. WASHER LOCK PIN 4. LH TRACKS (REF.) 5. FORWARD ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT ACCESS DOOR STRUCTURE (REF.) RH TRACKS (REF.) DET. B RD145AMM520001A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-46-00 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details. FWD

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-46-00-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. FORWARD-ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the forward-electronic-compartment access door. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113CZ Forward fuselage 114 113CZ Forward fuselage C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Ladder Commercially available To get access to the work area 1 Fluorescent light Commercially available To illuminate the work area 1 E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward fuselage H. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the forward-electronic-compartment access door (5) in position in the NLG bay. (2) Turn the electronic-compartment access door (5) until it is in the horizontal position. (3) Attach the forward-electronic-compartment access door (5) to the RH tracks. (4) Put the LH tracks (4) in position on the structure and adjust it. NOTE: Make sure that the forward-electronic-compartment access door is correctly attached and aligned in the RH and LH tracks. (5) Install the washers (2), spacers (3), and bolts (1) to attach the LH tracks (4) to the structure. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-46-00 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove all tools, equipment, and unwanted materials from the work area. (2) Close the forward-electronic-compartment access door (5) and push the lock pin. (3) Remove the ladder from the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-46-00 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
